subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Stocks and Bonds
organizations: New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority
lead_paragraph: The president of the Yankees told a Congressional hearing Friday that if the city had not issued tax-exempt financing for the team’s new stadium it would have left town.
snippet: The president of the Yankees told a Congressional hearing Friday that if the city had not issued tax-exempt financing for the team’s new stadium it would have left town.
